sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Card.css'; import StarRating from './StarRating'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Card(props) { const { id, productName, description, price, compare, discount, brand, category, subCategory, thumbnail, rate, imgone, imgtwo, imgthree, inCart, stock, sales, unit } = props; const [isInCart, setIsInCart] = useState(inCart || false); const toggleCart = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // ✅ Prevent Link navigation when clicking "Add" const updatedCartStatus = !isInCart; fetch(`http://localhost:5006/products/${id}`, { method: "PATCH", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ inCart: updatedCartStatus }), }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then(() => { setIsInCart(updatedCartStatus); }) .catch((error) => console.error("Error updating cart status:", error)); }; return (
{category}

{subCategory}

{description}

({rate})

By {brand}
₹{price} ₹{compare}
); } export default Card;
